Package BattleField

Class BattleField

java.lang.Object
BattleField.BattleField
public class BattleField extends Object
class that handles game states updates all enemies projectiles and player

    • BattleField

      public BattleField​(KeyInput keyInput)

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws the game elements onto the screen.
      Parameters:
      g2 - the Graphics2D object used for drawing

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the game state. This method updates the player's state and, if the game is not paused, performs a series of updates: power-ups, enemies, projectiles, and the stage. It manages the deletion of projectiles through an intermediate list.

    • getProjectiles

      public LinkedList<Projectile> getProjectiles()

    • preloadWaves

      public ArrayList<LinkedList<Enemy>> preloadWaves()
      Preloads all waves of enemies from CSV files. This method continuously loads waves of enemies from CSV files until a runtime exception occurs. If a RuntimeException occurs, the method returns the list of all successfully loaded waves.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of LinkedList representing all successfully preloaded waves.

    • isStageClear

      public boolean isStageClear()
      Returns whether the stage is clear.
      Returns:
      true if the stage is clear, false otherwise.

    • isVictory

      public boolean isVictory()
      Returns whether the game is won.
      Returns:
      true if the game is won, false otherwise.

    • getTotalScore

      public int getTotalScore()
      Returns the total score.
      Returns:
      the total score.

    • getWaveNotLoaded

      public ArrayList<Integer> getWaveNotLoaded()
      Returns a list of waves that have not been loaded.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of integers representing the waves that have not been loaded.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Returns whether the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • getAllWaves

      public ArrayList<LinkedList<Enemy>> getAllWaves()
      Returns all waves of enemies.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of LinkedList<Enemy> representing all waves of enemies.

    • updatePowerUp

      public void updatePowerUp()
      Updates the state of power-ups in the game. Each power-up is updated, checked for collision with the player, and applied if a collision occurs. Removes power-ups that have been collected by the player.

    • updateEnemies

      public void updateEnemies​(ArrayList<Projectile> projectilesToDelete)
      that moves enemies method checks if: they were hit by a projectile

    • updateProjectile

      public void updateProjectile​(ArrayList<Projectile> projectilesToDelete)
      method that moves projectiles and checks: if projectile is outside the playing field -> delete projectile, if projectile hit player -> hurt player and delete projectile,

    • updateStage

      public void updateStage()
      method that checks if the user: cleared a wave -> load new wave, cleared all waves -> victory, is dead -> game over,

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
